trans-unit.source: Defines the methods called during contract generation that can be used to modify the generated code for an operation.
trans-unit.target: 작업에 대해 생성 된 코드를 수정 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 계약 생성 중에 호출 메서드를 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IOperationContractGenerationExtension interface on an operation behavior (a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> type) to enable you to modify the code generated when a contract or endpoint is compiled into code.
trans-unit.target: 작업 동작에서 IOperationContractGenerationExtension 인터페이스를 구현 (한 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>유형) 하면 계약 또는 끝점이 코드로 컴파일될 때 생성 되는 코드를 수정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> inserts a custom operation behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 사용자 지정 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 호출 중</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 에 사용자 지정 작업 동작을 삽입</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Implement to modify the code document object model prior to the contract generation process.
trans-unit.target: 계약 생성 프로세스 시작 전에 코드 문서 개체 모델을 수정 하려면 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> inserts a custom operation behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 사용자 지정 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 호출 중</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 에 사용자 지정 작업 동작을 삽입</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The GenerateOperation method is called once for each contract.
trans-unit.target: GenerateOperation 메서드는 각 계약에 대해 한 번씩 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The working context that contains the <xref href="System.CodeDom"></xref> types necessary to modify the generated operation.
trans-unit.target: 포함 하는 작업 중인 컨텍스트는 <xref href="System.CodeDom"> </xref> 생성 되는 작업을 수정 하는 데 필요한 형식을 합니다.
